title: Dinnerbone: 今日将发布新预览版&下周计划
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
Dinnerbone:
We will create another pre-release for Minecraft 1.8.1 later today, containing lots of optimizations and some bug fixes.
我们今天晚点会发布一个新的 Minecraft 1.8.1 预览版，它会包含许多优化以及一些 bug 修复。

Dinnerbone:
As most of us will be away next week, there will not be another pre nor actual release next week.
由于我们【Mojang 工作室】的大多数人都会不在，下周将不会发布新的预览版或者正式版。

replies.txt_content:
